title: Add Vault Commander to thoughts-and-writing portfolio
description: Link to vault's thoughts-and-writing app for project showcase. Include: GitHub repo URL, description of Raycast extension, screenshots/demo, tech stack (TypeScript, React, Raycast API, fuse.js)
close_reason: Added Vault Commander to thoughts-and-writing portfolio site

title: Epic: Phase 2 - Claude Integration
description: v0.2: vault ask (query vault with Claude), vault summarize (summarize notes), vault reflect (Stoic prompts). Reuses search.ts buildSearchIndex()

title: Epic: Phase 3 - Todoist Integration
description: v0.3: vault task (quick task creation), vault tasks (today's tasks), vault inbox (Todoist inbox triage). Adds todoistApiKey to config.

title: Epic: Phase 5 - Unified System
description: v1.0: Smart capture (AI routes to right place), vault brief (morning summary), vault review (evening reflection), vault weekly (aggregated review)

title: Epic: Vault Commander Phase 1 MVP
description: Four commands (capture, today, add, search) for fast Obsidian access. Speed layer replacing 80% of 'open Obsidian' moments.

title: T001: Initialize Raycast extension
description: Create project, .npmrc, package.json with 4 commands, TypeScript, install deps
close_reason: Project scaffolded: package.json, .npmrc, tsconfig.json, dependencies installed

title: T018-T019: Documentation
close_reason: Documentation: CLAUDE.md (updated with Biome), ARCHITECTURE.md, DIAGRAMS.md, README.md created

title: TypeScript type system improvements
description: From type-design-analyzer review: readonly modifiers, branded types (AbsolutePath, RelativePath, MarkdownH2), remove duplicate buildObsidianUri, extract VaultFileRef base type, utility types
notes: COMPLETED: Updated types.ts with branded types (AbsolutePath, RelativePath, MarkdownH2, WikiLink), readonly modifiers on all interfaces, VaultFileRef base type, DeepReadonly and Result utility types. Updated config.ts, daily.ts to use new types. Removed duplicate buildObsidianUri from search.tsx. Fixed node: protocol imports. Ready to close.
close_reason: Type system improvements complete: branded types, readonly modifiers, VaultFileRef base type, utility types, removed duplicate function

title: Initial git commit
description: Run gitMeHome, pnpm check, create initial commit with all Phase 1 work
close_reason: Initial commit created: baf3e76 - feat: implement Phase 1 MVP

title: T002: Create type definitions (src/types.ts)
close_reason: Types created: VaultCommanderConfig, Preferences, SearchResult, IndexEntry, CaptureNote, DailyNote

title: Epic: Phase 4 - Voice & Automation
description: v0.4: Superwhisper → Inbox pipeline, Granola → Meeting Notes sync, Process scripts from Raycast. Reuses vault.ts file operations.
